item.title: Function Composition in JavaScript with Pipe
item.description: JavaScript is a very powerful language and it supports functional programing quite well. Function Composition toll make JavaScript even more powerful. I hope in this article, I will provide you an easy example of function composition with the use of pipe in JavaScript. So, you can understand function composition in JavaScript and you can write short, clean and functional code. What is Function Composition? Let’s start from basic by answering the question that what is function composition?
